Title: FUNC-01: Full Testing in Merge Branch

Step Action: Perform full testing of all predecessor PBIs in the Merge branch
Step Expected: All test cases pass without errors

Step Action: Verify that all predecessor PBIs are fully functional in the Merge branch
Step Expected: All predecessor PBIs are fully functional

Step Action: Perform backward compatibility testing in the Merge branch
Step Expected: No compatibility issues found

Step Action: Verify that all existing functionality works as expected
Step Expected: All existing functionality works as expected

Step Action: Perform impact testing in the Merge branch
Step Expected: No significant impact on existing functionality

Step Action: Verify that all impacted areas are fully functional
Step Expected: All impacted areas are fully functional

Step Action: File an issue task on the story for any issues found during testing
Step Expected: Issue task is created and assigned to development

Step Action: Verify that the issue is fixed by development and verified by QA in the Merge branch
Step Expected: Issue is fixed and verified

Title: VAL-02: Bug Filing for Non-Critical Issues

Step Action: File a separate bug for any non-critical issues found during testing
Step Expected: Bug is created and prioritized

Step Action: Verify that the bug is addressed in a future iteration
Step Expected: Bug is addressed in a future iteration

Step Action: Obtain CCB approval to merge changes into Master
Step Expected: CCB approval is obtained

Step Action: Merge changes into Master
Step Expected: Merge is successful

Step Action: Perform full testing in Master
Step Expected: All test cases pass without errors

Step Action: Verify that all predecessor PBIs are fully functional in Master
Step Expected: All predecessor PBIs are fully functional

Step Action: Update the build number for all predecessor items
Step Expected: Build number is updated

Step Action: Verify that the build number is correct
Step Expected: Build number is correct

Title: VAL-04: Update of UAT Test Cases

Step Action: Update all existing UAT test cases based on changes to Project Activities
Step Expected: UAT test cases are updated

Step Action: Verify that the UAT test cases are correct and complete
Step Expected: UAT test cases are correct and complete

Step Action: Run all existing SSM test cases
Step Expected: SSM test cases are run

Step Action: Clean up any SSM test cases that have changed since original implementation
Step Expected: SSM test cases are cleaned up

Step Action: Simulate a merge failure
Step Expected: Merge failure is detected and reported

Step Action: Verify that the merge failure is handled correctly
Step Expected: Merge failure is handled correctly

Step Action: Verify that all existing functionality works as expected
Step Expected: All existing functionality works as expected

Step Action: Perform regression testing to ensure that no existing functionality is broken
Step Expected: Regression testing passes without errors

Step Action: Verify that all documentation is updated to reflect changes
Step Expected: Documentation is updated

Step Action: Perform review of documentation to ensure accuracy and completeness
Step Expected: Documentation is accurate and complete
